target: Wu Cheng'en's "The Scholars" in the 14th chapter: "I am a piece of genuine heart, and I come here to deliver the message. I only wish to have no trouble, to be like the water that does not wash the boat.

### Idiom: 莫测高深
### Meaning: 没法揣测究竟高深到什么程度。语本《易·蒙》“利贞”唐孔颖达疏：“言人虽怀圣德，若隐默不言，人则莫测其浅深，不知其大小。”
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: web
source: 惟有我此花受尽摧残无人怜惜。吕西安念了下面一首，心里可是说不出的难过；卢斯托的莫测高深的镇静使他口齿迟钝。艾蒂安・卢斯托只管朝着苗圃中的树木出神。
target: Only this flower has suffered all the harm in the world and no one has pitied it. Lucien recited the following poem, but his heart was overwhelmed with sorrow; the inexplicable calm of Lucien Lusquet made his tongue tied. Etienne Lusquet kept staring at the trees in the nursery.

### Idiom: 转瞬之间
### Meaning: 非常短暂的一瞬间。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: web
source: 彼族虽船坚炮利，我可见景生情，以谋济勇；或更与义勇及各军联络声势，使其接应不暇，一遇有懈可击，则痛加剿洗，务夺坚巢。转瞬之间，光绪九年他便从布政使擢拔巡抚，提升之快，令人乍舌。兹于月之初二日由龙起程出关，初四日安抵谅山驻扎，消息更易相通。
target: Although the enemy tribe possesses strong ships and powerful cannons, I can take advantage of the situation and strategize to aid the brave. Alternatively, I can enhance the morale by connecting with the righteous and brave soldiers from various armies, keeping them so busy that they cannot respond. When they show any signs of relaxation, I will ruthlessly attack and seize their stronghold. In the blink of an eye, in the ninth year of the Guangxu reign, he was promoted from the position of a governor to a high-ranking official. The speed of his promotion was astonishing. On the second day of the month, he set off from Long and passed through the gate. On the fourth day, he safely arrived and camped at Liangshan, making communication easier.

context:
### Idiom: 生吞活剥
### Meaning: ①比喻生硬地抄袭或模仿。语本唐刘肃《大唐新语·谐谑》：“李义府尝赋诗曰：‘镂月成歌扇，裁云作舞衣。自怜回雪影，好取洛川归。’有枣强尉张怀庆好偷名士文章，乃为诗曰：‘生情镂月成歌扇，出意裁云作舞衣。照镜自怜回雪影，时来好取洛川归。’人谓之谚曰：‘活剥王昌龄，生吞郭正一。’”②谓不加烹调。③比喻侵略欺凌。④又作：生拉硬扯。⑤比喻一知半解。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: cc-news
source: 近日大陆山东威海一处动物园上演惊恐一幕，有民众亲眼目睹栅栏中白虎将一只孔雀‘生吞活剥’吃掉，地上满是羽毛，吓坏现场一票游客，对此园方表示园内散养上千只孔雀，可能不小心误闯，老虎吃孔雀是首次发生，但看见了也没法让老虎松口。游客王女士向《河北日报》表示，8日前往西霞口神雕山野生动物世界游玩，先是看到白虎旁散落一地孔雀羽毛，再定睛仔细瞧，赫然发现老虎正在撕咬孔雀，这才拿起手机拍下过程，直击整只孔雀被活生生吃掉，让她惊呼是‘真正的野生动物园’。
target: Recently, a Chinese visitor in a Zhejiang wildlife park has witnessed a white tiger eating a Peking duck, which shocked the crowd of visitors who were there.

### Idiom: 抱成一团
### Meaning: 保持一致，行动起来像一个人。形容关系极为亲密。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: cc-news
source: 在小组男女混合竞啦组中，日本获金牌，澳洲第二，巴西第三。该赛为疫情恢复以来的大赛，得奖队伍及观众均相当激动，尤其日本及美国获冠军颁奖时，队员们抱成一团喜极而泣，台下观众也哭成一团，气氛热烈温馨。
target: In the mixed team competition, the Japanese team won the gold medal, the Australian team won the silver medal, and the Brazilian team won the bronze medal. It was a big competition since the outbreak of COVID-19. The award-winning teams and the audience were very emotional and excited, especially when the Japanese and American teams won the gold medal, the team members hugged and cried, and the audience on the scene also cried, and the atmosphere was hot and warm.

target: Below, Xiaoxia will introduce 63 rare English names and the Chinese meanings for each name. Each name sounds very good and gives people a feeling of dignity, and English names are becoming more and more important for friends and relatives living abroad. It is easy to choose a simple English name at random, but this will cause many problems. For example, Delysia, Sanela, Najiba, Priti, Takisha, etc., the following is a list of English names for your reference, and I will talk to you about the English names of the name.

### Idiom: 运筹帷幄
### Meaning: 谓在后方决定作战策略。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 看似人畜无害，破绽多，但却是一顶一的武学高手，拥有100%空手接 白刃的强大技能。朝中重臣，生性狡诈阴险，老奸巨猾，心狠手辣，做事滴水不漏，在朝中运筹帷幄，是皇帝之下的二号人物，深得皇帝的宠信。明面上萧慕苓是治国有方的忠臣，但背地里勾结外敌，为了自己的利益通奸卖国。
target: Though seemingly harmless with many flaws, he is in fact a top martial arts master, possessing a powerful skill of being able to catch a blade with his bare hands 100% of the time. A high-ranking official in the court, he is cunning, treacherous, ruthless, and meticulous in his actions, leaving no loose ends. He strategizes within the court, being the second most powerful person under the emperor, and has deeply gained the emperor's trust and favor. On the surface, Xiao Mulin is a loyal minister who governs the country effectively, but behind the scenes, he colludes with foreign enemies and betrays his country for his own interests.

### Idiom: 提纲挈领
### Meaning: 提起鱼网的总绳，拎住皮衣的领子。《韩非子·外储说右下》：“善张网者引其纲，不一一摄万目而后得。”《荀子·劝学》：“若挈裘领，拙五指而顿之，顺者不可胜数也。”后以“提纲挈领”比喻抓住事物的关键，或把问题扼要地提示出来。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: web
source: 各分党委（党总支、党工委）书记，校党史学习教育领导小组办公室成员单位主要负责人出席会议。二是制定独创的学习指南，突出党史学习教育的重点难点问题，使党史学习教育提纲挈领、入脑入心。党委常委、宣传部部长兼统战部部长、
target: The meeting was attended by Party Committee (Party Committee of the Grassroots Party Organization) secretaries, and the members of the Office of the Leading Group for Studying and Implementing the Party History of Xiamen University.

context:
### Idiom: 解民倒悬
### Meaning: 解解救；倒悬人被倒挂，比喻处境困难、危急。比喻把受苦难的人民解救出来。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 目前《临高启明》实体书已出版前两卷，第一、二卷分别由中国广播影视出版社和现代出版社出版。五百余名当代社会各行各业的失意青年，统称为“五百众”或“五百废”，穿越者中有人想称王称霸，有人想解民倒悬，有人想阻止清朝崛起，也有人只想在古代过腐败的享乐主义生活。经过一系准备工作，穿越者在二零某某年的9月乘坐丰城轮，携带大量现代工业设备，通过一个虫洞，来到明末崇祯年代的海南临高县，从一片空白建设工业文明，并逐步制霸全球。
target: The first two volumes of "Linqiao Qiming" are now published in physical books. The first and second volumes are published by China Radio and Television Press and Modern Press. More than 500 young people from various industries in contemporary society, collectively referred to as "five hundred people" or "five hundred wastes", have traveled back in time. Some of them want to become kings and emperors, some want to save the people, some want to prevent the rise of the Qing Dynasty, and some just want to enjoy a corrupt life in ancient times. After a series of preparations, the travelers traveled back in time to the late Ming Dynasty in 2000+, aboard the Fengcheng ship, with a large amount of modern industrial equipment, through a wormhole, and built an industrial civilization from scratch, and gradually became the master of the world.

source: 字体：但童年时代过大年的事却让我记忆犹新，犹如昨日。已到知天命之龄的我，时常会在夜深人静的时候回忆小时候的点点滴滴。
target: But the memories of youth remain fresh in my mind, as if yesterday. As I get older, I often reflect on the little things that I remembered in my childhood in the dark of the night.

### Idiom: 连篇累牍
### Meaning: 形容篇幅多，文辞长。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 各地方政府态度不一，有反对、有支持、也有沉默。反党反社会主义分子煽动新闻界，进行错误的舆论导向，使得中国媒体报道非常热烈，不少媒体予以支持，进行连篇累牍甚至言过其实的报道；人民日报、新华社等记者甚至加入游行，一些报纸因而被查封。。随著六四武力清场，各地学运戛然而止。
target: The attitudes of local governments vary, with some opposing, some supporting, and some remaining silent. Anti-party and anti-socialist elements stir up the news media, leading to incorrect public opinion guidance, making Chinese media reports very heated. Many media outlets support this, producing extensive and even exaggerated reports; reporters from People's Daily, Xinhua News Agency, and others even joined the protests, resulting in some newspapers being shut down. With the violent crackdown on the June 4th movement, student movements across the country came to an abrupt halt.

context:
### Idiom: 隐恶扬善
### Meaning: 隐隐匿；扬宣扬。不谈人的坏处，光宣扬人的好处。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: cc-news
source: 第三、台湾有不少驻点的外国记者，很不错的fixer，以及专门研究中国或台湾的专家，如果是透过这些人介绍而来的记者基本上就会好很多；但反过来说台湾也是不少明明就是号称在研究台湾或中国，但对这两个国家的理解鸟到不行就是了。第四、与其说台湾不够被了解，我倒是觉得台湾自己有不少受访者有隐恶扬善的习惯，因此更令人担忧的是随之而生的不信任。原本在受访的阶段以为台湾哪里做的不错，下次再来采访的时候就会慢慢发现不太对，这种不信任一直累积下去，都是在消耗大家的credit
target: Thirdly, Taiwan has quite a few foreign correspondents stationed, excellent fixers, and experts who specialize in studying China or Taiwan. If a journalist is introduced through these people, they will generally have a better understanding. However, on the other hand, there are also many who claim to be studying Taiwan or China, but their understanding of these two countries is extremely poor. Fourthly, rather than saying Taiwan is not understood enough, I feel that there are quite a few interviewees in Taiwan who have a habit of hiding their faults and highlighting their virtues, which makes the ensuing distrust even more worrying. Initially, one might think that Taiwan is doing well in certain aspects during the interview stage, but upon further visits, inconsistencies start to appear. This kind of distrust keeps accumulating, consuming everyone's credit.

target: "Yi" said: "The expedition went smoothly, the evildoer was beheaded, and his accomplices were captured." ### Idiom: 拔帜易帜
### Meaning: 帜旗帜；易换。比喻推翻别人，自己占有。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 汉王遂立张耳为赵王。此战，韩信奇正并用，背水列阵，拔帜易帜，灵活用兵，出奇制胜，速战速决，最终以少胜多，谱写了中国古代战争史上光辉的篇章，是我国古代灵活用兵、以少胜多的典型战例。前206年秦国灭亡后，西楚霸王项羽和汉王刘邦为争夺天下，展开了楚汉战争。
target: The king appointed张耳 as a king of 赵. In the battle,韩信 took advantage of tactics of improvisation, tactics of surprise, quick battles, and ultimately victory by a few, which created a bright chapter in the history of Chinese ancient military history. After the collapse of the Roman Empire in 206 BCE, the Battle of 楚-汉 started between the West Chapulva King Ebba and the king of the Roman Empire, which was the battle of 楚-汉.

### Idiom: 自求多福
### Meaning: 求助自己比求助他人会得到更多的幸福。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by google_api; Corpus: web
source: 游戏的主角是一只没头没脑的肥猩猩，看到香蕉苹果就毫无节制的狂吃，直至那堆积成山的水果皮铺天为地如汹涌澎湃般汹涌而至，嘴馋的肥猩猩瞬间惊倒。自然，这类撞击也会减少野猪同学们的血量，一旦血量为0，我们自己的主角也就只能自求多福了。
target: The protagonist of the game is a fat orangutan who is clueless. He eats bananas and apples without restraint when he sees them. Shocked instantly. Naturally, such collisions will also reduce the blood volume of the wild boar classmates. Once the blood volume reaches 0, our own protagonist can only ask for happiness.

**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: web
source: 由于建立了新型的军民关系，双方未端一次酒杯，未送一份礼物，车站的工作蒸蒸日上，部队的两万余吨货物源源不断地运到了营建工地。他说，新宪法是新中国建国以来最好的一部宪法，是安邦治国的大法，认真学习和坚决执行，就能保障开创社会主义建设的新局面，实现国民经济翻两番的宏伟目标。
target: Due to the establishment of a new type of military-civilian relationship, both sides did not toast a glass of wine or send a gift, yet the work at the station was thriving, and more than 20,000 tons of goods from the troops were continuously delivered to the construction site. He said that the new constitution is the best constitution since the founding of New China, and it is a great law for stabilizing and governing the country. By studying and implementing it seriously, we can ensure the creation of a new situation in socialist construction and achieve the grand goal of doubling the national economy.

context:
### Idiom: 玉树琼枝
### Meaning: ①形容树木华美。②比喻贵家子弟。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: web
source: 为家里增添一抹春色！在花团锦簇中感受喜庆年味|每日速讯。玉树琼枝轻摇曳。全国总工会拨付3.96亿元中央财政资金。
target: Add a touch of spring to your home! Feel the festive atmosphere of the New Year among the flowers. Yushu Qiongzhi lightly swaying. The All-China Federation of Trade Unions allocated 3.96 billion yuan of central government funds.

context:
### Idiom: 赫赫之功
### Meaning: 赫赫盛大显著貌。显赫的业绩。形容功劳极大。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: cc-news
source: 首先，在参加相亲会前做好心理建设（提振士气），其次，扬长避短地撰写个人简历（立于不败之地），索要联系方式时，要其疾如风，培养对方好感时，要其徐如林，展开追求时，要侵略如火，被对方玩弄时，要不同如山。孙子相亲学家说，每个女孩都该知道，‘善战者无赫赫之功’。原意是说，擅长作战的人，不会以辉煌的战功彪炳于世，反而是润物细无声地取得胜利。
target: First, prepare yourself for the appointment (boost your confidence), second, make a good resume (stand out), when you ask for contact information, you should act quickly, when you build the other person's interest, you should act slowly, when you start the chase, you should act like a mountain. The marriage expert, Sunzi, said that every girl should know that the "warriors do not make huge achievements, but they make the victory invisible."

context:
### Idiom: 谈情说爱
### Meaning: 谈恋爱。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: cc-news
source: 谈情说爱的好日子。遇到心动的对象别错过，有利勇敢示爱，体验别样爱恋。
target: Good days for talking about love and expressing affection. Don't miss out when you meet someone who touches your heart, take advantage of the opportunity to bravely express your love, and experience a different kind of romance.

context:
### Idiom: 黑漆一团
### Meaning: ①指墨团。②形容非弛暗，没有一点光明。或对人对事一无所知。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: weibo
source: 因为你内心污染得厉害，自己的光明被遮盖住了，佛光想灌都灌不进来。你们打起坐来，不管开眼也好，闭眼也好，黑漆一团，一团乌烟瘴气，这就证明地狱在你面前。等你定慧到了，只要一定，自身光明随时都可以跟佛的光明相接！
target: Because your inner pollution is so serious that your own brightness is covered, the Buddha's light wants to灌灌不进来. When you sit, no matter whether you open your eyes or close them, it is black一团一团乌烟瘴气, which proves that hell is in front of you. When your concentration and wisdom reach a certain level, as long as you are determined, your own brightness can be connected with the Buddha's brightness at any time!

context:
### Idiom: 琴瑟之好
### Meaning: 比喻夫妻间感情和谐。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: web
source: “那就对了，本王与王妃刚刚结成琴瑟之好，正是夫妻二人恩爱之时，可本王听说大婚第二日二夫人就给王妃安排通房，岂不是置本王于不义，有心破坏我夫妻和睦？”。
target: "That's right, I, the king, have just formed a harmonious relationship with the queen. It's a time of love and affection between us. However, I heard that on the second day of the grand wedding, the second wife arranged a conjugal visit for the queen. Isn't this placing me in an unjust position, intentionally trying to disrupt the harmony between my wife and me?"

context:
### Idiom: 愧不敢当
### Meaning: 感到惭愧，承当不起。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: web
source: 忠臣这两个字，愧不敢当。
target: The two words, 'faithful' and 'loyal', are worthless.
